00058 #define SZ_MAX_BLOCKS_PER_SCANLINE            128
00059 #define SZ_MAX_PIXELS_PER_BLOCK                32
00060 #define SZ_MAX_PIXELS_PER_SCANLINE     (SZ_MAX_BLOCKS_PER_SCANLINE)*(SZ_MAX_PIXELS_PER_BLOCK)

00063     int options_mask,
00064     int bits_per_pixel,

00069     char *out);
